body: My friend and I have been trying to make plugins is there anyone that would be able to give me a hand or point me in the right direction?
body_tagged: My friend and I have been trying to make plugins is there anyone that would be able to give me a hand or point me in the right direction?
title: Question

replies.body:
Be fluent in Java. Start simple and make your way up.

Watch you tubers. I learnt from a youtuber called PogoStick29Dev

Ask Javi (or me). Javi taught me about Redis, he's a great teacher and he'll give you examples as well!

Anyway, good luck with programming. Maybe you'll become the next Avicus developer.
replies.body_tagged:
Be fluent in Java. Start simple and make your way up.

Watch you tubers. I learnt from a youtuber called PogoStick29Dev

Ask Javi (or me). Javi taught me about Redis, he's a great teacher and he'll give you examples as well!

Anyway, good luck with programming. Maybe you'll become the next Avicus developer.

replies.body:
Well, for coding a plugin, you need to have much experience with Java. If you're not a programmer, then you'd have to learn it. 


Learning a programming language will take much time. Here's a video for the beginning: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3u1fu6f8Hto

Learning a programming language will take much time. Here's a video for the beginning: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3u1fu6f8Hto
